remarks: Value of the conjugate of a complex number.  The value is the real part minus ` _i ` times the imaginary part.  Definition 10-3.2 of [Gleason] p. 132.  (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Nov-2013.)
statement: remim $p |- ( A e. CC -> ( * ` A ) = ( ( Re ` A ) - ( _i x. ( Im ` A ) ) ) ) $.
